content: crocheted happiness shawl 1 in a simple and slightly airy pattern it is wonderfully large so you can cuddle up in it happiness is crocheted in sultan deluxe which is a wonderful and soft cake yarn in 100 % cotton and it is available in some really fabulous color combinations find your favorite and crochet yourself a lovely happiness shawl happy crocheting you can also crochet happiness in twister **materials ** - cotton kings sultan deluxe - 1 skein - crochet hook g 4 0 mm **finished size ** approx 77 x 32 **gauge ** 17 sts x 11 row = 4 x 4 **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** treble_crochet **chain**-space chain space 1 https //hobbii com/happiness-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=happiness-shawl&utm_term=swr
